CloudinaryComponent

A base component for Cloudinary components.

Methods

(protected, static) normalizeOptions(…options) → {Object}

Combine properties of all options to create an option Object that can be passed to Cloudinary methods.
undefined and null values are filtered out.

Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
options <repeatable>

one or more options objects
